title: Place your first Cell in the reactor by clicking 'â˜°'
flavor_text: The first component is online. The foundation of your reactor is set.

title: Sell all your power by clicking 'Power'
flavor_text: Your first sale. The grid is now connected to your output.

title: Reduce your Heat to 0 by clicking 'Heat'
flavor_text: Managing thermal output is critical. Venting heat is the first step to a stable core.

title: Put a Heat Vent next to a Cell
flavor_text: Component placement is key. Adjacency can dramatically improve efficiency.

title: Purchase an Upgrade
flavor_text: Time to invest in efficiency. Upgrades are the path to greater output.

title: Purchase a Dual Cell
flavor_text: Double the fission, double the power. A straightforward upgrade to your core.

title: Have at least 10 Cells
flavor_text: From a single cell to a small field. Your reactor's potential is growing.

title: Purchase a Perpetual Cell upgrade
flavor_text: This upgrade eliminates the need for cell replacement, ensuring constant output.

title: Purchase a Capacitor
flavor_text: Power storage is now possible. Capacitors let you buffer energy for larger sales.

title: Complete Chapter 1: First Fission
flavor_text: You've mastered the fundamentals of reactor operation. Now, it's time to scale up.

title: Generate at least 200 power per tick
flavor_text: You are now a net energy producer, consistently supplying the grid.

title: Purchase an Improved Chronometers upgrade
flavor_text: Precision timing increases efficiency. Every tick now counts for more.

title: Have 5 different kinds of components
flavor_text: A complex machine requires diverse parts. Your reactor design is becoming more sophisticated.

title: Have at least 10 Capacitors
flavor_text: Your energy storage capacity has significantly increased, allowing for greater strategic control.

title: Generate at least 500 power per tick
flavor_text: Your reactor is now a significant power source on the grid.

title: Upgrade Potent Uranium Cell to level 3 or higher
flavor_text: Component specialization is paying off. This cell now operates far beyond its base specifications.

title: Auto-sell at least 500 power per tick
flavor_text: Automation is online. Your surplus energy is now sold automatically, ensuring constant revenue.

title: Achieve a steady power generation of 1,000 per tick for at least 3 minutes.
flavor_text: Stability is proof of a well-designed system. You're maintaining a high, steady output.

title: Have at least 10 active Advanced Capacitors and 10 Advanced Heat Vents.
flavor_text: Advanced components are online, allowing you to handle much greater power and heat loads.

title: Complete Chapter 2: Scaling Production
flavor_text: Automation and efficiency are now core to your operation. But there is always room to grow.

title: Have at least 5 Quad Plutonium Cells
flavor_text: You've unlocked a more potent, and volatile, fuel source. Plutonium offers greater rewards at a greater risk.

title: Achieve a passive income of $50,000 per tick through auto-selling.
flavor_text: Your facility is now a major economic engine, generating immense profit.

title: Expand your reactor 4 times in either direction
flavor_text: The reactor hall has been expanded, making room for more complex and powerful designs.

title: Have at least 5 Quad Thorium Cells.
flavor_text: A new fuel source is available. Thorium provides a significant leap in energy potential.

title: Reach a balance of $1,000,000,000.
flavor_text: You're no longer just running a reactor; you're at the helm of a financial empire.

title: Have at least $10,000,000,000
flavor_text: Your financial reserves have reached a new order of magnitude.

title: Have at least 5 Quad Seaborgium Cells.
flavor_text: This synthetic element pushes the boundaries of physics, offering unprecedented energy density.

title: Sustain a reactor heat level above 10,000,000 for 5 minutes without a meltdown.
flavor_text: You've demonstrated mastery over extreme heat management, a dangerous but rewarding feat.

title: Generate 10 Exotic Particles
flavor_text: Immense energy concentrations are producing something new... Exotic Particles have been discovered.

title: Complete Chapter 3: High-Energy Systems
flavor_text: You've pushed conventional technology to its limit. To progress, you must embrace the exotic.

title: Generate 51 Exotic Particles
flavor_text: A sufficient quantity of exotic matter has been collected to begin meaningful research.

title: Generate 250 Exotic Particles.
flavor_text: Your stockpile of Exotic Particles is growing, unlocking new research possibilities.

title: Purchase the 'Infused Cells' and 'Unleashed Cells' experimental upgrades.
flavor_text: Applying exotic matter to existing components has created something far greater than the sum of its parts.

title: Reboot your reactor in the Research tab
flavor_text: A system reboot is required to integrate your research and apply its benefits.

title: Purchase an Experimental Upgrade
flavor_text: Research is unlocking technologies that were once thought impossible.

title: Have at least 5 Quad Dolorium Cells
flavor_text: This new cell type represents another leap forward in exotic energy generation.

title: Generate 1,000 Exotic Particles
flavor_text: Your systems are now consistently harvesting exotic matter from the quantum foam.

title: Have at least 5 Quad Nefastium Cells
flavor_text: Harnessing the power of Nefastium is a new milestone in exotic energy.

title: Place an experimental part.
flavor_text: Experimental technology doesn't just generate power; it manipulates the laws of energy production itself.

title: Complete Chapter 4: The Experimental Frontier
flavor_text: You have mastered both the atom and the quantum world. Your reactor is a monument to scientific achievement.

title: All objectives completed!
flavor_text: You have achieved the pinnacle of reactor technology. Your work is complete.
